forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 46F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clearing and windy. High 11C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. Cloudy skies will become sunny in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Gusty winds early. Low 4C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Windy early. Low 39F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High around 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High near 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 60F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.
